name: Winter Flower
description:
White. 

Endless, all encompassing. 

Caught in an abrupt winter storm, Haru fears for the worst as the mountain path has become impassable, unable to press on or turn back. Mulling over her little to no options, a form emerges from the flurry of snow, one that may just save her...

Features:

  • Fully voiced
  • Two distinct  endings
  • Traditional Japanese instrumental music 
  • Beautifully illustrated CGs and sprite art
  • Inspired by traditional Japanese folklore

Winter Flower was made for the 2021 Winter VN Jam by a small dedicated team.

Credits:
